articles.title: Amanda Knox back on trial in Italy in lingering case linked to roommate Meredith Kercher's murder - CBS News

articles.content: Rome — Amanda Knox, the American woman who spent nearly four years in an Italian prison after being convicted in 2007 of murdering her college roommate Meredith Kercher as they both studied abroad, w… [+3544 chars]
